{{Description|A pair of mysterious puppets lost in the endless process of honing their combat skills finally meet a fearless wanderer in the depths of the world.<br />Their mechanical bodies and hearts may keep them alive for a thousand years or more, but how many worthy foes can they meet in that time, and how many legendary battles will they fight?}}
The '''Dual Maguu Kenki: Lone Gale and Galloping Frost''' is a special event boss appearing in the event [[Legend of the Vagabond Sword]]. While the fight consists of two bosses, a third boss, '''Maguu Kenki: Mask of Terror''' sometimes joins their ranks.

*{{Enemy|Maguu Kenki: Lone Gale}}
*{{Enemy|Maguu Kenki: Galloping Frost}}
*{{Enemy|Maguu Kenki: Mask of Terror}}

They appears in the following challenges where the bosses can gain a [[Curious Vitality]] [[Aura]] depending on the player's settings.:
* [[Legend of the Vagabond Sword/Battlesong: Ingenious Impermanence#Battlesong: Ingenious Impermanence I|Battlesong: Ingenious Impermanence I]]
* [[Legend of the Vagabond Sword/Battlesong: Ingenious Impermanence#Battlesong: Ingenious Impermanence II|Battlesong: Ingenious Impermanence II]]
* [[Legend of the Vagabond Sword/Wanderer's Threefold Challenge|Wanderer's Threefold Challenge]].

The three Maguu Kenki also returned in the [[Version/2.3|Version 2.3]] [[Spiral Abyss/Floors/2021-12-01|Spiral Abyss]].

==Abilities and Attacks==
===Lone Gale:  Like the Rushing Wind===
*'''Slashes:''' Slashes at the player twice, dealing {{Color|Anemo DMG}}, and sending out a wind blade with each slash that deals {{Color|Anemo DMG}} on hit.
*'''Flowing Water:''' Slashes twice, sending wind blades towards the player's current location, dealing {{Color|Anemo DMG}}.

===Galloping Frost: Like the Biting Frost===
*'''Slashes:''' Slashes at the player three times, dealing {{Color|Cryo DMG}}.
*'''Iai: Shadowrush:''' Enters Iai stance and rushes toward the player while drawing its sword, dealing {{Color|Cryo DMG}} along its path.
*'''Whirlwind Slash:''' Enters Iai stance and charges for a while before quickly slashing around itself, then slashes again over a larger AoE, dealing {{Color|Cryo DMG}} with each slash.
*'''Frost Dive:''' Summons an additional sword, charging up before slamming the ground for a wide [[AoE]], dealing {{Color|Cryo DMG}}. Also leaves a large {{Cryo}} field that deals {{Color|Cryo DoT}} to players inside the radius.

===Mask of Terror: Like a Karmaic Terror===
*'''Oushi no Omote (Protective Mask):''' Summons an oni mask to protect it from ranged attacks if it is not performing one of its other attacks.
*'''Pushing Mask:''' Summons a large oni mask in front of it before pushing it forward to deal {{Color|Anemo DMG}}.
*'''Exploding Mask:''' Summons a large oni mask at the player's position that swirls uncontrollably before exploding, dealing {{Color|AoE Cryo DMG}} or {{Color|AoE Anemo DMG}}.
